# Basic math operations in R

In order to create a function in R ...

```{r}
#write a new function according to your number in the list
my_function <- function(x) {
  y = 10 / x + 18 * x ^ 2
  return(y)
}
```

Then...

```{r}
#make a vector called "X"
x <- c(1:100)
```

After that ...

```{r}
# create a ...
y <- my_function(x)
y
```

In the Console...

```{r}
> y
```
